com.sjfc.fisherapp
Class DirectoryListActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      com.sjfc.fisherapp.DirectoryActivity
          com.sjfc.fisherapp.DirectoryListActivity

public class DirectoryListActivity
extends DirectoryActivity

Displays full directory list with filter box; manages directory updates.

Field Detail

directoryUrl

public static java.lang.String directoryUrl
The URL for the XML that the directory data is pulled from during an update. Defaults to https://genesee2.sjfc.edu:8910/pls/PROD/sjfc_android_app.employees_xml

Method Detail

onCreate

public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
Initializes and displays the Directory List View.

Overrides:
onCreate in class DirectoryActivity

startSync

public void startSync(boolean auto)
Helper class to start the update parse thread. Helps distinguish between auto-sync, manual sync, and first-launch sync.

Parameters:
auto - Whether this update was initiated automatically.

isTimeForSync

private boolean isTimeForSync()
Checks whether it is time to start an auto-update. Compares current week-of-the-year with the stored week-of-the-year of the last successful sync.

Returns:
boolean

fillPeopleListView

private void fillPeopleListView()
Fills the ListView with local database data. Queries the local MySQL database for full or filtered list and displays the results.

startXMLParseThread

private void startXMLParseThread()
Starts a thread to update the local database with the server's data. Does not start a new parse thread if one already exists. Thread parses the XML file found at the URL provided by the Office of Information Technology. Parses into a temporary MySQL table and copies it into the permanent one upon completion. If the parse results in 0 entries, it is run again to workaround an XmlPullParser bug. Then updates the ListView.

updateFirstSyncMessage

private void updateFirstSyncMessage(boolean first)
Shows or hides the message and progress bar for the user to see upon their first launch of the app (when the list is empty and unusable).

isPeopleField

public boolean isPeopleField(java.lang.String tag)
The parse thread uses this to decide whether its current tag is an entry field or not.

Returns:
boolean

updateSyncIndicator

void updateSyncIndicator(boolean visible)
Shows or hides the indeterminate progress indicator circle in the title bar.

Parameters:
visible - Whether the indicator should be shown or hidden.

onDestroy

public void onDestroy()
Runs on Activity destruction; cleanly interrupts any running parse thread.

Overrides:
onDestroy in class DirectoryActivity

onPrepareOptionsMenu

public boolean onPrepareOptionsMenu(Menu menu)
Sets up what is displayed when the device's Menu button is pressed: "Update now" or "Stop update".

Handles Option Menu choice to start or stop a manual update.
